DOC.brief_summary: A randomized double -- ‐blinded comparison -- ‐day mifepristone misoprostol misoprostol cervical preparation second -- ‐trimester surgical abortion 100 woman 14 0/7 -- ‐19 6/7 week gestation .
DOC.brief_title: Same-Day Mifepristone-Misoprostol Compared Misoprostol Only Surgical Abortion Cervical Preparation
DOC.detailed_description: Women desire abortion gestational age 14 week 0 day 19 week 6 day randomize 200-mg mifepristone identical placebo 400-mcg misoprostol vaginally 4-6 hour prior D & E . Primary outcome cervical dilation assess large Hegar dilator accept without resistance . Secondary outcome include total procedure time , patient provider perception . The study power detect 2-mm difference cervical dilatation 48 participant arm .
DOC.criteria: healthy woman eligible non‐urgent D & E 14 0/7 week 19 6/7 week gestation , confirm sonogram emergent need D & E fetal demise intolerance allergy contraindication mifepristone misoprostol
